title: Coldplay > Radiohead, China = Black Mirror, JFK: Solved? 10.27.17
itunes:title: Coldplay > Radiohead, China = Black Mirror, JFK: Solved? 10.27.17
description:
In episode 15, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Teresa Lee to discuss John Kelly being a monster, Fox New's weird claims about Radiohead stealing from Coldplay, Xi Jinping & China's new citizen rating system, plus Jack's JFK theories & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
